LBA started in 2014 with 13 apartments, allotted in two buildings – Chiado Trindade Apartments and São Bento Best Apartments. Until the second quarter 2016 we shall open three more units offering additional 32 apartments in Chiado.
Apartments and People 2 Adult(s) 0 Children 1 Apartments

Lisbon Best Apartments started in 2014 with two buildings - Chiado Trindade Apartments and São Bento Best Apartments. In 2016 we opened three new units that offer another 32 apartments in Chiado, and in 2018 we inaugurated the newest lodging unit - Marquês Best Apartments.
